page.title: 16Tourism
page.content: Many homes with spare rooms welcome families with rather less money to lay out on touring, and the owners provide a nights rest and cooked breakfast for people in transit, or for those who prefer to be out all day with picnic or bar lunches on their way. Some land ladies even provide the packed lunch and fill thermosflasks for the trip. High Mill and Barker Knott are two of the established farms who render this successful service. Not so many in this valley, Bellman Ground is a good example, and gives privacy and quiet too, since the road to the house is a track and not a through route. The cottages are well appointed but not too luxurious. Ash cottage is rented out by the Cumbria Trust Housing Authority, a new idea. This scheme is developing rapidly in the Lakes.
